actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965.

summary.text: Revises the Higher Education Act to provide that employment under a federally sponsored work/study program shall be furnished only to a student who is in need, as determined by an individual or board appointed for such purpose by the president of the educational institution, of the earnings from such employment in order to pursue a course of study at such institution.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965.
